| Any freight allowances shown should only apply to and from Dollands Moor Sidings                                   |                    |                                           |
| Any train travelling in the Down direction which requires to couple to a train already berthed in any of the three |                    |                                           |
| train roads must first be sent to an empty train road. It will then be shunted via signal YE62 on the Up Main line |                    |                                           |
| and into the appropriate Train Road to be coupled.                                                                 |                    |                                           |

| Platform 2                                                                                                         |                    | Attaching/ Detaching and Platform Sharing |
